targets.expr:
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"analytics-db-([1-9][0-9]*)$", container="postgres"}) by (pod)
/ 
sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"analytics-db-([1-9][0-9]*)$", container="postgres"}) by (pod)

targets.expr:
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"portal-(.*)$", container="portal"}) by (pod)
/ 
sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"portal-(.*)$", container="portal"}) by (pod)
